mapper.insert: insert into t_bumen (bumenId, bumenName, bumenMark, bumenMark1, bumenMark2, bumenType, bumenType1, bumenType2, bumenDouble, bumenDouble1, bumenDouble2, buyuanId, buyuanName) values (#{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumenMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumenMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumenMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumenType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bumenType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bumenType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bumenDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bumenDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bumenDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_bumen set bumenName = #{bumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bumenMark = #{bumenMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bumenMark1 = #{bumenMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bumenMark2 = #{bumenMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bumenType = #{bumenType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bumenType1 = #{bumenType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bumenType2 = #{bumenType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bumenDouble = #{bumenDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bumenDouble1 = #{bumenDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bumenDouble2 = #{bumenDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, buyuanId = #{buyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buyuanName = #{buyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where bumenId = #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select bumenId, bumenName, bumenMark, bumenMark1, bumenMark2, bumenType, bumenType1, bumenType2, bumenDouble, bumenDouble1, bumenDouble2, buyuanId, buyuanName from t_bumen where bumenId = #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
